attributes.action: Stop repatriations to the UK and refuse entry to anyone travelling.
attributes.additional_details:
This should be done in an effort to contain and concentrate on the COVID-19 active cases the we already have. 

China has had a rise in COVID-19 cases again due to foreign nationals entering China. So it goes without saying that we should be refusing entry to anyone for now.

I don’t believe it’s to the benefit of anyone to travel at the current time. Why put people and their families at further risk unnecessarily.
attributes.background: Any UK citizen that left the UK after 11/03/20 acted irresponsibly. They should remain where they are until testing negative for COVID-19. We should be reducing/eliminating the risk of further cases entering the UK. We should be refusing entry to anyone for the time being.
